alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron; Price; Sawyer; Washburn (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Iron, east central Washburn, southern Ashland, northwestern Price and Sawyer Counties through 145 PM CDT... At 113 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Clam Lake, to near Hayward, moving east at 45 mph. At 110 PM CDT the Hayward Airport observation site recorded a gust of 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Clam Lake around 120 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Couderay, Chief Lake on Chippewa Flowage, Chippewa Flowage West, Chippewa Flowage East, Radisson, New Post, Park Falls, Butternut and Winter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
